metadata.title: CVE-2020-11988 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache XmlGraphics Commons 2.4 and earlier is vulnerable to server-siderequest forgery, caused by improper input validation by the XMPParser. Byusing a specially-crafted argument, an attacker could exploit thisvulnerability to cause the underlying server to make arbitrary GETrequests. Users should upgrade to 2.6 or later.

criterions.comment: xmlgraphics-commons: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
